verses.text: After \w these|strong="H5971"\w* \w things|strong="H8441"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H3615"\w* \w accomplished|strong="H3615"\w*, \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w approached|strong="H5066"\w* \w me|strong="H5066"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* said, “\w The|strong="H3548"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, including \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w have|strong="H5971"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* kept themselves separate \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* surrounding \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w whose|strong="H3669"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w like|strong="H3478"\w* those \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w the|strong="H3548"\w* \w Canaanites|strong="H3669"\w*, \w Hittites|strong="H2850"\w*, \w Perizzites|strong="H6522"\w*, \w Jebusites|strong="H2983"\w*, \w Ammonites|strong="H5984"\w*, \w Moabites|strong="H4125"\w*, \w Egyptians|strong="H4713"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Amorites.

\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H2088"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w some|strong="H1992"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* wives \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w themselves|strong="H1992"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H5375"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* mixed \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w leaders|strong="H8269"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w officials|strong="H8269"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* lead \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w unfaithfulness|strong="H4604"\w*!”

\w and|strong="H8064"\w* said: “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w* \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w embarrassed|strong="H3637"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w lift|strong="H7311"\w* \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*, \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w God|strong="H8064"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* \w are|strong="H8064"\w* \w higher|strong="H4605"\w* \w than|strong="H7235"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* \w our|strong="H3588"\w* \w guilt|strong="H5771"\w* \w has|strong="H3588"\w* \w reached|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w brief|strong="H4592"\w* \w moment|strong="H7281"\w*, \w grace|strong="H8467"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w preserve|strong="H4241"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stake \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H5414"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*. \w Even|strong="H5869"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5659"\w*, \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* new \w life|strong="H4241"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* light \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4687"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w our|strong="H3588"\w* God, \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* say \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*? \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H6258"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*! \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H7604"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7604"\w*. \w Here|strong="H2088"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* guilt, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w no|strong="H5975"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* \w can|strong="H5975"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*.”
